message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that's worth a lot to me. I'm starting the offer at $15000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and understand the value you place on the product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $12000 for this item. Would you consider lowering the price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $13000 for this unique product. It's a fair compromise, and I believe you'll still get a great deal.
